__e: You turned my father against me, you turned my Maurice against me and you turned me daughter against me.
- You got us into this, sugar. You sold me to Maurice and you were right:
But there is a time for everything and in my opinion, it's time for me and Maurice to settle things once and for all.
Maurice dear, you're making a great deal over nothing.
Oh, my poor Maurice, how you torment yourself.
So you see, you're a part of it all, Maurice, just as you're a part of me, and we both are a part of God.
Oh, Maurice, I'm, like, so happy for you.
Maurice, I just wanna tell you I'm real sorry you didn't get the girl in the end.
Maurice, I am letting you in on this gig, not--
Now, uh, Maurice has been big enough to come here so, uh,
Maurice has called an emergency town meeting.
I am happy to toast Maurizio of Nassau with you but above all I toast you because I appreciate and love your splendid poetry.
If you find any mention of Maurice de...
Next time, get Maurice to reserve us a room if you can't remember yourself... preferably with a carpet, and something else in the hot tap besides...
Maurice just picked her up from the station.
Maurice is the one I'm in on the deal with.
Maurice is the only man for me.
